tool.name: Frameshift Deletions Checks
tool.description: Detect frameshifting indels in consensus sequences
tool.command:
ln -s '$input' input.bam && ln -s -f '${input.metadata.bam_index}' input.bam.bai &&
frameshift_deletions_checks -i input.bam -c '$consensus' -f '$reference' -g '$gff' -o '$output' -O '$orf1ab' $english $zero_based
